m_szDocTitle: New Hydrogen Fuel Cell EV Floats Like A Butterfly, In Wales
m_szDocSumamry: February 17th, 2016 by Tina Casey   Everybody knows that a hydrogen fuel EV cannot compete with battery EVs because the technology is too expensive…right? Or wrong, as the case may be. The Welsh startup Riversimple Movement is pursuing one solution to the affordability angle, by not selling any cars. Instead, Riversimple is offering car buyers a lease-only deal that covers the whole shebang, including maintenance, insurance, and the fuel — starting with its first production model, the super lightweight Rasa.
